post-production.description: E-do Studio offers a made-to-measure photo retouching service to enhance your images shot in the studio or on location. Our service offers several categories of retouching: high-end retouching for your campaigns, editorial and beauty shoots, packshot retouching for your accessories, piqu√©, flat and ghost, and lookbook retouching for all your e-commerce shoots on models. We guarantee perfect visual consistency, so that your images can be used optimally on all your platforms.
